runs.comm: straightening on middle, pitched up, runs it in front of cover, who charges in and prevents the single
driven down the pitch, bursts out of the bowler's hands
some width, and that is all he needs to crack it through cover-point, not much of a gap there, but he's hit it
hasn't quite timed it, but he's lifted it high over the bowler, and it has enough in it to roll into the straight rope
good length on the stumps, nudged to leg

he's gone first ball, walking across to a length ball on the stumps, misses the nudge to leg, and is caught in front, nothing wrong with the line of the delivery, height could have been an issue, he was struck high above the knee roll, and was also quite some way outside the crease
swats a shortish one over square leg, but they are kept to one
that has moved away and bounced from a length, and beaten the outside edge
works it to midwicket
goes for the pull, not quite off the middle, two men after it, one running back, one across, one both dive, former stops even as latter reaches the ball
slow and full on the pads, turned square
into the pads, and he's flicked it wristily for four just past short fine leg
overpitched on the stumps, and he's heaved it high over midwicket, few bounces into the rope
comes forward and drives now, into the gap past a diving extra cover
turned off the pad behind square leg
leg side again, off the pad wide of short fine, they come back for a tight second, needs a dive from the striker
Mathews strikes again, catches him on the crease with an incoming length delivery, and Jahurul plays on off an inside edge
has a heave at a full one, and a thick inside edge races for four past short fine
tries to punch off the back foot, the ball is fullish, and he mistimes
drags a slower one down to deep square leg off the toe end
nippy length ball angled in, thick outside edge runs to third man as he closes the face to turn it to leg
very full and on the stumps, mistimes a forcing stroke to extra cover
full toss on the stumps, pushed to mid on
slower one into the pads, nudged to short fine
comes down and swats a length ball in the air over midwicket and it rolls into the boundary
moves across outside off and misses with the swing, the ball sails just past leg stump, not called a wide, rightly so
heaves one off the stumps, it runs to short fine, Malinga, who does well to stop it
slow length ball on off, turned to midwicket
makes some room outside leg but steers it straight to point
starts with a full toss on the pads, Ashraful is disappointed as he flicked it straight to deep backward square
clears front leg and has a heave, misses a low full toss which wasn't far from off stump
slow, and wide, he cannot steer it past backward point, in fact, it almost carried to that man
drives straight and hard, Malinga stops it casually with his boot
near yorker just outside off, patted to extra cover
full toss on the pads, flicked away, but they cannot find the boundary, deep square runs to his left to cut it off
bends the knee and cuts wide of the sweeper, Jeevan Mendis again to keep them to one
slow and straightish, nudged to midwicket
turned off the pad to square leg
tossed up full outside off, slog swept into the deep, fumble there, but they are kept to one in the end
opens up and belts a full delivery down to the sweeper
that is flighted and goes straight outside off, beating his cut
heaves a length ball to deep midwicket, who keeps them to one, Jeevan Mendis again
that takes off and moves away from a length on off, and beats the flail
that has just cleared fine leg, poor ball, down the pads, he shuffles and swats it in the air, fielder in the deep leaps, in vain
Ashraful is barely done yet, not that short, but he's pulled it nevertheless, and has comfortably cleared deep midwicket this time
very well done, a full toss outside off, he moves across, and closes the face on it to help it along behind square leg
he sprays it full and wide across the right-hander though

he's been given leg before, after a shout from Perera that went on and on and on, Ashraful swung and missed a full toss, but did that strike him outside leg? yes, it has, that is seriously poor from the umpire, at a crucial stage in the chase, against a batsman who's just hit three successive boundaries, the umpire has just caved into Thisara's long appeal
heaved down to deep midwicket
down for the slog sweep and sends it to the deep midwicket rope
hit down to long on
dabs it neatly past short third man and it runs away quickly
works it off the pad in front of square leg for two
very full outside off, he gets across to squeeze it to point, non-striker has to scramble back

Thisara probably feels he can get away with any appeal, this is very wide, it has even bounced after it passes the batsman who reaches out for it, but Thisara's put in an appeal for caught behind, no harm in trying luck if it has proved to be so good in your previous over
hit to long on
has a swing at a high full toss, thick edge on the bounce to the keeper, who does well to collect it to his rigth
full toss outside off again, sliced over cover
he's picked out third man, full and wide, he's thrown bat at it, and sent it sailing to the man in the deep
full and too wide outside off
moves across, takes a full toss and hits it over midwicket, he hasn;t timed it well, and long on will get there in time
tossed up legbreak, beats him on the cut
goes straight on, he cuts it straight to point
comes down and lofts it over the bowler, beats both long on and long off running across
somehow that has missed leg stump, tossed up, and inside edge off the attempted sweep has saved him
makes room to a legbreak and punched to the sweeper
full toss outside off, mowed over the deep midwicket rope, he's been eyeing that area throughout
fetched from wide outside off and swung to deep square leg
wide outside off, tries to run it away, cannot manage more than a thin under edge
chipped high over midwicket and falls just short of long run sprinting across
full and wide, drilled away to deep point
top edges a hook down to fine leg
appeal for stumping, as he lunges out and misses a sweep, Chandimal quick to remove the bails, but the batsman's back foot is back in time
tossed up slowly, he skips out and slices it hard over point
moves down and works wide of long on for two
tosses it up very slow, at 70 kph, he has to stop after coming out, and carves it to the sweeper
short and flat, and pulled hard and high over the man at deep midwicket
similar delivery, sitting up, and this time he pulls it wide of deep midwicket for a one bounce four
full on the stumps, chipped in the air, falls just short of long on
walks out to a full one coming in outside leg, and a thick inside edge flies fine
near yorker on the stumps, but he's stayed back and flicked it in front of square for two, direct hit would have claimed Mushfiqur
bouncer which he crouches and allows to sail over
backs away and hammers a shortish delivery down to long on, fumble there, and two taken
very full and dipping on the stumps, turned wide of fine leg
comes out and drives hard through the bowler's hands to long on
squeezes it through midwicket, man in the deep runs in and keeps them to one
bowled full, outside leg, Mahmudullah making room, but still getting cramped and working it through midwicket along the ground
heaves a high full toss high and down into deep midwicket's hands

what a gift, Mahmudullah did well to paddle a low full toss past short fine, Malinga hauled it in, threw it back to the keeper, Mominul wanted the third, Mahmudullah responded, Mominul stopped, yes and no, both ended up mid-pitch in the end, Mominul started walking back right away, but replays showed batsmen hadn't crossed over, and Mahmudullah has to go
works a full one from outside off down the pitch, bowler moves across to stop it
driven to extra cover, whose fumble converts a tight single into a comfortable one
skips out and slams a full delivery over midwicket, keeps sailing and bounces just inside the rope
walks outside off to scoop it over fine leg, but misses, the ball bounces over the stumps
leaves the crease and scythes a drive to the sweeper
throws his bat at a wide one and it zooms over short third man
comes out and misses the length ball, is hit on the pad, Chandimal appeals, just in case
dropped flat and shortish, hit down to long on
goes down for a slog sweep, misses, and the ball runs behind point, another shout for lbw, could have been an inside edge, umpire thought so, given as runs
comes down and heaves down to long on
cannot get under the ball, skips out, but has to push along the ground to long on
flighted very full and hit out to deep midwicket, they make it back for a tight second
drives a full delivery to mid off
full toss on middle, he backs away and has a go, sends it sailing tamely to midwicket
moves away from a length and bounces to beat the edge
hits him on the glove with a shortish delivery even as Razzak tries to get out of the way
full now, flicked off the pad to deep square
takes on the bounce outside off and upper-cuts it into the short third man boundary
pitches outside leg and hits him on the thigh pad, and it rolls to off for them to scamper a single
full toss hit to midwicket
heaves a full delivery on leg down to deep square
very full, he comes out, it becomes a yorker, and he digs it to third man
slashed down to third man
straight and wide down leg
goes down and tumbles as he fails to connect with the scoop
gets maximum off the last ball with a swing over deep midwicket to a full delivery
makes some room and drives a full one hard, but straight to extra cover on the edge of the circle
widish full toss eased down to the sweeper
can't connect with a one in the blockhole widish outside off
swinging away, just inside the marker, very full, and he misses again
swung away through midwicket, pulled back just inside
digs out a yorker around leg down the ground
